cost.description: Cost in credits for this request

cost.title: Cost

finetune_id.description: ID of the fine-tuned model you want to delete.
finetune_id.title: Finetune Id

finetune_details.description: Details about the parameters used for finetuning
finetune_details.title: Finetune Details

finetune_id.description: ID of the fine-tuned model you want to use.
finetune_id.title: Finetune Id

finetune_strength.description: Strength of the fine-tuned model. 0.0 means no influence, 1.0 means full influence. Allowed values up to 2.0
finetune_strength.title: Finetune Strength

guidance.description: Guidance strength for the image generation process
guidance.title: Guidance

image.description: A Base64-encoded string representing the image you wish to modify. Can contain alpha mask if desired.
image.title: Image

mask.description: A Base64-encoded string representing a mask for the areas you want to modify in the image. The mask should be the same dimensions as the image and in black and white. Black areas (0%) indicate no modification, while white areas (100%) specify areas for inpainting. Optional if you provide an alpha mask in the original image. Validation: The endpoint verifies that the dimensions of the mask match the original image.
mask.title: Mask

output_format.description: Output format for the generated image. Can be 'jpeg' or 'png'.

prompt.description: The description of the changes you want to make. This text guides the inpainting process, allowing you to specify features, styles, or modifications for the masked area.
prompt.title: Prompt

prompt_upsampling.description: Whether to perform upsampling on the prompt. If active, automatically modifies the prompt for more creative generation
prompt_upsampling.title: Prompt Upsampling

safety_tolerance.description: Tolerance level for input and output moderation. Between 0 and 6, 0 being most strict, 6 being least strict.
safety_tolerance.title: Safety Tolerance

steps.description: Number of steps for the image generation process
steps.title: Steps

webhook_secret.title: Webhook Secret

info.description: Authorize with an API key from your user profile.

post.description: Delete a finetune_id that was created by the user

get.description: Get details about the training parameters and other metadata connected to a specific finetune_id that was created by the user.

post.description: Submits an image generation or editing task with FLUX.2 [FLEX].

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 2 Flex V1 Flux 2 Flex Post

post.summary: Generate or edit an image with FLUX.2 [FLEX]

post.description: Submits an image generation or editing task with FLUX.2 [Klein 4B].

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 2 Klein 4B V1 Flux 2 Klein 4B Post

post.summary: Generate or edit an image with FLUX.2 [Klein 4B]

post.description: Submits an image generation or editing task with FLUX.2 [Klein 9B].

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 2 Klein 9B V1 Flux 2 Klein 9B Post

post.summary: Generate or edit an image with FLUX.2 [Klein 9B]

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 2 MAX.

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 2 Max V1 Flux 2 Max Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX 2 MAX

post.description: Submits an image generation or edit task with FLUX.2 [PRO].

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 2 Pro V1 Flux 2 Pro Post

post.summary: Generate or edit an image with FLUX.2 [PRO]

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX.1 [dev].

schema.title: Response Flux Dev V1 Flux Dev Post
Response Generate Flux Kontext Max V1 Flux Kontext Max Post

post.summary: Edit or create an image with Flux Kontext Max

schema.title: Response Generate Flux Kontext Pro V1 Flux Kontext Pro Post

post.summary: Edit or create an image with Flux Kontext Pro

post.description: Submits an image expansion task that adds the specified number of pixels to any combination of sides (top, bottom, left, right) while maintaining context.

schema.title: Response Expand V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Expand Post

post.summary: Expand an image by adding pixels on any side.

post.description: Submits an image generation task with the FLUX.1 Fill [pro] model using an input image and mask. Mask can be applied to alpha channel or submitted as a separate image.

schema.title: Response Fill V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Fill [pro] using an input image and mask.

post.description: Submits an image generation task with the FLUX.1 Fill [pro] finetune model using an input image and mask. Mask can be applied to alpha channel or submitted as a separate image.

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 0 Fill Finetuned Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX.1 Fill [pro] finetune using an input image and mask.

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro].

schema.title: Response Flux Pro 1 1 V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Post

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro] with ultra mode and optional raw mode.

schema.title: Response Generate Flux 1 1 Ultra V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Ultra Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX 1.1 [pro] with ultra mode and optional raw mode.

post.description: Submits an image generation task with FLUX 1.1 [pro] finetune with ultra mode.

schema.title: Response Generate Bigblue Finetuned V1 Flux Pro 1 1 Ultra Finetuned Post

post.summary: Generate an image with FLUX 1.1 [pro] finetune with ultra mode.

get.description: An endpoint for getting generation task result.
List all finetune_ids created by the user

tags.description: Generation task endpoints. These endpoints allow you to submit generation tasks.
tags.name: Models

tags.description: These utility endpoints allow you to check the results of submitted tasks and to manage your finetunes.
tags.name: Utility
